entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
